item.description:
This will be a potluck dinner. I will also invite a few of my spanish speaking friends. Tell me if you are coming and indicate what you would like to bring, main course, salads, wine, desserts. If bringing something will keep you away, come without but let me know.

I am located right off Rte. 125 in Kingston, NH, very easy to get to and I have plenty of parking in my yard.
Tel: 603-642-5434

group.name: The NH Seacoast Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Cena chez Alberto
